remarks: If a real number modulo a positive real number is less than the positive real number decreased by 1, the real number increased by 1 modulo the positive real number equals the real number modulo the positive real number increased by 1.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2018.)
statement: modltm1p1mod $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ /\ ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) -> ( ( A + 1 ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) ) $.
